title: AD Grievous Wound Item
body:
Many people have asked for such a thing, and I came up with an idea for it! The item would do the following:

Shattered Battleaxe: (3000 Gold)
80 AD
200 Mana

Unique Passive - Thornblade: After using an ability, your next basic attack (on-hit) on enemy champions below 40% health inflicts Grievous Wounds for 4 seconds.

It would build out of B.F. Sword and Sheen. It would be nice if it had CDR, but you can't just create the stat in a build path. The mana is near useless, but it's an added perk.

replies.body: There really isn't a need for an ad grievous wound item since adcs can already burn you like your in hell with the red buff just a thought
Er, I'm not sure it should have that much AD *and* mana. What if it build out of pickaxe instead of bf sword, and had 50-60 AD instead?

> [{quoted}](name=tombdragon,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=bYIhMenx,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-04-15T21:40:42.562+0000)
>
> Er, I'm not sure it should have that much AD *and* mana. What if it build out of pickaxe instead of bf sword, and had 50-60 AD instead?

Gold efficiency-wise, it's actually only worth 3200 Gold. Any less AD and it will be near-useless. It can't get Armor Pen, so my only thought is reducing the amount of AD, but giving it Zeke's Herald's aura or something.
An AD grevious wounds item would either make sustain champs useless or never be bought.

> [{quoted}](name=Xuldin,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=bYIhMenx,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-04-15T21:40:02.982+0000)
>
> An AD grevious wounds item would either make sustain champs useless or never be bought.

Remember, it's about balance. It will make sustain near useless, as long as the opponent is below 40% HP. Buying a Runaan's Hurricane would apply the Grievious Wounds to multiple people as well.
But now it's spellblade. You can't spam grievous wound every auto attack.

The passive should just be spellblade, I think.
Otherwise you can stack it with other spellblade ({{item:3025}}, {{item:3057}}, {{item:3100}}, {{item:3078}})
Also, since sheen gives AP, so should all its upgrades.

Otherwise, I'm all for ad grievous wound item.
